The location itself was perfect. The house has tons of charm, unfortunately it seems to be in disrepair. Some of the things promised on the website weren’t there on the property. The back yard needs major maintenance. There was not a fire pit as advertised. The back door was spongy from leaking and there was a mold smell throughout the whole house. The kitchen was beautiful but needed to be cleaned. The drawers had old stuff from previous renters and food crumbs in them. The shower had a razor that had been used in it. The front porch was not maintained. We removed the cushions as they were so dirty. The American flag honestly needed to be removed it was in such poor shape. On arrival we did not receive instructions on check in with keypad code or any response from Kelly until I contacted airBNB. She was quick to respond after but it was 4pm Corinth time when we were able to check in. All in all, wonderful location. Hope it receives the maintenance it deserves.
